select f.fid, fstore_name, ftitle, fthumb, c.cid, fstatus, ct.ctid, ct.ctname, t.tid, t.tname, f.memail, case when fstatus='FUNDING' then nvl(ffunding_score,0) else nvl(fstore_score,0) end fscore, min_price from funding f inner join category ct on (f.ctid = ct.ctid) inner join competition c on c.cid=f.cid and c.tid=f.tid inner join the_hyundai t on(f.tid = t.tid) inner join ( select fid, min(fporigin_price) min_price from funding_product group by fid) m on f.fid=m.fid
where fstatus in ('FUNDING','STORE','END')
and fstatus = #{criteria.fstatus}
and (fstore_name like '%'||#{criteria.keyword}||'%' or ftitle like '%'||#{criteria.keyword}||'%') order by f.fid OFFSET #{criteria.page}*12 ROWS FETCH NEXT 12 ROWS ONLY

select count(*) from funding f inner join category ct on (f.ctid = ct.ctid) inner join competition c on c.cid=f.cid and c.tid=f.tid inner join the_hyundai t on(f.tid = t.tid) inner join ( select fid, min(fporigin_price) min_price from funding_product group by fid) m on f.fid=m.fid
where fstatus in ('FUNDING','STORE','END')
and fstatus = #{criteria.fstatus}
and (fstore_name like '%'||#{criteria.keyword}||'%' or ftitle like '%'||#{criteria.keyword}||'%')
